main.applet_mode_desc:
SwitchBlade cannot run in applet mode.

Please relaunch SwitchBlade in full RAM mode: on the Switch's main menu, hold [R] while selecting a game.

ams_update.title: Updating CFW...
ams_update.rcm_not_found: Error: Could not find RCM payload
ams_update.rcm_cant_read: Error: Could not read RCM payload
ams_update.power_service_init_error: Error: Failed to initialize power service
ams_update.reboot_payload_set_failed: Error: Failed to set reboot payload
ams_update.spl_init_error: Error: Failed to initialize SPL service
ams_update.download_failed:
Download failed!

Failed to download CFW archive. Please check your internet connection and try again.
ams_update.overwrite_ini: Do you want to overwrite existing .ini config files?
ams_update.sysmodule_flag_delete:
Would you like to delete all the custom sysmodules startup flags?
This will turn off all your sysmodules and prevent crashes if you have sysmodules that do not support the latest Atmosphere.
ams_update.extract_failed:
Extraction failed!

Failed to extract CFW archive. The archive may be corrupted or there may not be enough space on the SD card.
ams_update.download_hekate:
Do you want to also download Hekate?

If not, the Switch will now reboot to a special payload to finalize the install.
ams_update.hekate_ini_overwrite: Do you want to overwrite existing Hekate .ini config files?
ams_update.hekate_copy_reboot_payload:
Do you want to copy the Hekate payload to reboot_payload.bin?

This sets Hekate as the default payload for 'Reboot to Payload'.
ams_update.update_complete_reboot:
CFW update completed!

The Switch will now reboot to a special payload to finalize the install.

Press A to reboot now.
ams_update.atmosphere_desc: From this menu, you can download and update Atmosphere CFW necessary to run homebrew software.
ams_update.ascent_desc: Ascent by exploitz86 is a CFW pack based on TeamNeptune's DeepSea that includes Atmosphere, Hekate and various homebrew apps.
ams_update.no_cfw_data: Error: Could not find CFW data in nx-links
ams_update.cannot_fetch_nx: Error: Could not fetch data from nx-links. Check internet connection.

bootloader_update.title: Updating Bootloader...
bootloader_update.download_failed:
Download failed!

Failed to download bootloader.
bootloader_update.hekate_ini_overwrite: Do you want to overwrite existing Hekate .ini config files?
bootloader_update.extract_failed:
Extraction failed!

Failed to extract bootloader.
bootloader_update.hekate_copy_reboot_payload:
Do you want to copy the Hekate payload to reboot_payload.bin?

This sets Hekate as the default payload for 'Reboot to Payload'.
bootloader_update.update_complete:
Bootloader updated successfully.

Press A to continue.
bootloader_update.bootloader_desc: From this menu you can download and update various bootloaders and RCM payloads.
bootloader_update.hekate_ipl_title: Download a stripped down 'just works' hekate_ipl.ini config file. This will overwrite your existing hekate_ipl.ini.
bootloader_update.no_bootloader_data: Error: Could not find bootloader data in nx-links
bootloader_update.cannot_fetch_nx: Error: Could not fetch data from nx-links. Check internet connection.
bootloader_update.overwrite_ipl:
Overwrite existing hekate_ipl.ini?

This will replace your current boot entries.

cheats_mods.title: Download and Manage Cheats and Mods
cheats_mods.cheat_menu_desc: Download and manage cheat codes for your games with ease, using community‑driven databases from GBAtemp — including the popular 60FPS cheats created by ChanseyIsTheBest.
cheats_mods.mod_menu_desc: Download and manage mods for your games directly from GameBanana, giving you fast access to a massive library of community‑made enhancements, tweaks, and custom content.

payload.title: Inject Payload
payload.desc: Select a payload file to reboot into. Payloads are searched in /payloads/ and /bootloader/payloads/ directories.
payload.no_payloads_found:
No payload files found.

Place .bin payload files in /payloads/ or /bootloader/payloads/ directory.
payload.reboot_payload_confirm: Are you sure you want to reboot to this payload?
payload.failed_to_inject: Failed to inject payload. Make sure the file is valid.

cheats_menu.title: Cheats Menu
cheats_menu.delete_all_cheats:
This will delete ALL cheat files under atmosphere/contents.
Are you sure?
cheats_menu.delete_orphaned_dialog:
This will delete cheat files for games not currently installed.
Proceed?
cheats_menu.all_download_warning:
WARNING:
This will download and extract the entire cheats database without filtering which can be thousands of files.
 (version: {})

Are you sure you want to proceed?
cheats_menu.restart_confirm: Restart the console to apply changes?
cheats_menu.info_desc: Changing Atmosphere config requires a restart to take effect.
cheats_menu.quota_exceeded: CheatSlips quota exceeded. Please try again later.
cheats_menu.extracting_gfx_cheats: Extracting graphics cheats for installed games...
cheats_menu.download_failed:
Download failed!

Failed to download cheat archive. Please check your internet connection and try again.
cheats_menu.extract_failed:
Extraction failed!

Failed to extract cheat archive. The archive may be corrupted or there may not be enough space on the SD card.
cheats_menu.gba_download_desc:
This will download a daily updated archive of cheat codes from 'gbatemp.net'.
Cheat codes for games you don't have installed won't be extracted to your SD card.
You can turn off cheat updates for specific games in 'Tools→Exclude Titles'.
Installed cheats version:
cheats_menu.individual_download_desc: Download individual cheat codes from the GBAtemp.net database or cheat sheets from Cheat Slips
cheats_menu.download_individual_gfx_button: Download individual graphics enhancing cheat codes
cheats_menu.build_id_not_detected: Could not detect Build ID for this game.
cheats_menu.no_cheats_installed:
No cheats installed for this game.

File not found:
cheats_menu.no_cheats_available: No cheats available for this game.
cheats_menu.no_cheats_for_game:
Cheat file not found on server.
This game may not have cheats available yet.
cheats_menu.cheat_parse_error:
Failed to parse cheat data.
JSON is invalid or corrupted.

Preview:
cheats_menu.no_cheat_for_build_id2:
No cheats available for this Build ID.
Available Build IDs:
cheats_menu.no_cheat_for_build_id: No cheats available for this Build ID.
cheats_menu.cheat_download_success:
Cheat downloaded successfully!

{} has been added to your cheat file.
cheats_menu.delete_all_cheats_for_game: Delete all cheats for this game
cheats_menu.delete_all_cheats_confirm: Delete all cheat files for this game?
cheats_menu.exclude_desc:
Select titles to EXCLUDE from bulk cheat downloads.
Excluded titles will be skipped when downloading GBAtemp or graphics cheat archives.
cheats_menu.no_cheats_in_file: No cheats found in cheat file.
cheats_menu.delete_cheat_file_confirm:
Are you sure you want to delete the cheat file?

This will remove all installed cheats for this game.

File:

custom_downloads.desc:
Custom downloads allow you to add your own archives for quick installation.
Add direct download links to homebrew, tools, or CFW packages.
Downloads will be extracted to the root of your SD card.
custom_downloads.warning: Warning: These are not endorsed by SwitchBlade. Only add downloads from trusted sources.
custom_downloads.atmosphere_packages_desc:
Downloads containing the Atmosphere custom firmware.
It WILL prompt to preserve ini files, delete sysmodule flags, and download Hekate if applicable.
custom_downloads.homebrew_tools_desc:
Downloads containing homebrew applications and tools.
It WONT prompt to preserve ini files, delete sysmodule flags, or download Hekate.
custom_downloads.custom_added:
Custom download added successfully!

The app needs to restart to show the new download.
custom_downloads.custom_deleted:
Custom download deleted!

The app needs to restart to update the list.
custom_downloads.extract_failed: Extraction failed. The archive may be corrupted.

firmware_download.description: Download Firmware dumps from 'https://github.com/THZoria/NX_Firmware'. Once downloaded, will be extracted to '/firmware'. You can then install it using Daybreak.
firmware_download.download_failed:
Download failed!

Failed to download firmware. Please check your internet connection and try again.
firmware_download.extract_failed:
Extraction failed!

Failed to extract firmware. The archive may be corrupted or there may not be enough space on the SD card.
firmware_download.launch_daybreak:
Firmware downloaded.

Do you want to start Daybreak to install it?
firmware_download.title: Downloading Firmware...

notify.no_games_gamebanana: No games found in the GameBanana database
notify.string_to_short: The search string must be at least 3 characters long
notify.mod_unsupported: The mod isn't supported by SwitchBlade
notify.request_error: An error occurred while requesting the mod list. Please check your internet connection and try again. If the problem persists change in settings the strict search option.

about.description: SwitchBlade is an all-in-one homebrew tool for Nintendo Switch that manages mods, cheats, CFW updates, and system customization.
about.thanks:
◆ Thanks to @HamletDuFromage for AIO Switch Updater
◆ Thanks to @PoloNX for SimpleModDownloader
◆ Thanks to @nadrino for SimpleModManager
◆ Thanks to Natinusala, xfangfang and XITRIX for borealis
◆ Thanks to NicholeMattera for Simple-INI-Parser

mods.author: Author
mods.strict: Strict search when looking up games (no false positives)
mods.recheck_all_desc:
This option resets all mods cache status and rechecks if each file is properly applied.
When files were managed without SwitchBlade, the displayed mod status can be wrong. This typically happens when you modified some mod files, or other programs override some of the applied files.
mods.recheck_all_confirm:
Do you want to reset mod cache and recheck all mod files?

This will verify if each file is properly installed.
mods.disable_all_desc:
This option will remove all installed mods files.
Note: to be deleted, installed mod files need to be identical to the one present in this folder.
mods.disable_all_confirm:
Do you want to disable all installed mods?

This will remove all mod files from the install directory.
mods.cannot_apply_no_mods: Cannot apply preset with no mods.
mods.apply_preset_confirm:
Apply preset '{}'?

This will:
1. Remove all active mods
2. Apply {} mod(s) from this preset
mods.no_mods_in_folder: No mods found in this game folder.
mods.cannot_save_no_mods: Cannot save preset with no mods selected.

tools_tab.applet_mode_not_supported: This feature isn't available in applet mode
tools_tab.cleanup_confirm:
Do you want to delete all Atmosphere reports?

This will delete:
- atmosphere/crash_reports
- atmosphere/fatal_reports
- atmosphere/fatal_errors
- atmosphere/erpt_reports
tools_tab.cleaned_up_numer: report folder(s) has been cleaned up succesfully.
tools_tab.no_reports_found: No report folders found to delete.

outdated_titles.no_outdated_titles: All your games are up to date!

joycon.jc_desc:
Change the colors of your Joy-Cons. Select a preset below or create your own using the color picker.

Color picker:
joycon.pc_desc: Change the colors of your Pro Controller. Select a preset below.
joycon.jc_success:
Joy-Con colors backed up successfully!

The app needs to restart to show the backup in the list.
joycon.pc_success:
Pro Controller colors backed up successfully!

The app needs to restart to show the backup in the list.
joycon.pc_bk_fail: Failed to backup Pro Controller colors
